verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:4
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren: return every man to his house: for this thing is done of me. And they obeyed the words of the Lord, and returned from going against Jeroboam.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:5
verses.text: And Rehoboam dwelt in Jerusalem, and built cities for defence in Judah.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:6
verses.text: He built even Beth–lehem, and Etam, and Tekoa,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:7
verses.text: And Beth–zur, and Shoco, and Adullam,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:8
verses.text: And Gath, and Mareshah, and Ziph,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:9
verses.text: And Adoraim, and Lachish, and Azekah,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 11:10
verses.text: And Zorah, and Aijalon, and Hebron, which are in Judah and in Benjamin fenced cities.
